attributes.action: Allow boys in british highschools to wear shorts if it is above 22 degrees
attributes.additional_details: They should do it because girls can wear skirts at british highschools and boys have to wear trousers , a blazer , a shirt and a tie. Boys have a higher chance at heatstroke and black clothing absorbs more heat. So thats why shorts should be allowed in highschools in the UK.
attributes.background: Allow boys in highschools to wear shorts if it is above 22 degrees celcius.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639484
